text: The first lady or first gentleman of the Philippines () is a spouse of President of the Philippines. ==List== Pres No. Portrait First Lady or First Gentleman Tenure Age at tenure start President 1 Hilaria Aguinaldo January 23, 1899 – March 23, 1901 1 Aguinaldo 2 Aurora Quezon November 15, 1935 – August 1, 1944 Quezon 3 Pacencia Laurel October 14, 1943 – August 17, 1945 Laurel 4 Esperanza Osmeña August 1, 1944 – May 28, 1946 Osmeña 5 Trinidad Roxas May 28, 1946 – April 15, 1948 Roxas 6 Victoria Quirino April 17, 1948 – December 30, 1953 Quirino 7 Luz Magsaysay December 30, 1953 – March 17, 1957 Magsaysay 8 Leonila Garcia March 18, 1957 – December 30, 1961 Garcia 9 Eva Macapagal December 30, 1961 – December 30, 1965 Macapagal 10 Imelda Marcos December 30, 1965 – February 25, 1986 Marcos I De facto Ballsy Aquino-Cruz February 25, 1986 – June 30, 1992 C. Aquino 11 Amelita Ramos June 30, 1992 – June 30, 1998 Ramos 12 Loi Ejercito June 30, 1998 – January 20, 2001 Estrada 13 Jose Miguel Arroyo January 20, 2001 – June 30, 2010 Arroyo De facto Kris Aquino June 30, 2010 – June 30, 2016 Aquino III De facto Honeylet Avanceña June 30, 2016 – June 30, 2022 Duterte 14 Louise Araneta–Marcos June 30, 2022 – Current Marcos II ==Living former first ladies and first gentlemen== As of , there are six living former first ladies and one living first gentleman. The most recent first lady to die was Victoria Quirino (1948–1953), daughter of Elpidio Quirino on November 29, 2006 No. Image Spouse Date of birth Age 1 Amelita Ramos 2 Imelda Marcos 3 Loi Ejercito 4 Jose Miguel Arroyo acting Ballsy Aquino-Cruz (de facto) Kris Aquino (de facto) Honeylet Avanceña (de facto) Updated daily according to UTC. == Notes == == References == *[ Pres No.]: President number
title: First Ladies and Gentlemen of the Philippines
